Performing JVEEVNT02 at
http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/indextools.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/vep-home/WebContent/docs/testcases/events2/events2.htm

Opened file com.ibm.ivj.examples.vc.customerinfo.CustomerInfoS2.java in VE and
deleted the WindowClosing event on the this bean. It deleted the source
correctly, Now did an Undo and the following exceptions were logged and event
was not added back in

Looks like a problem in the event decoder.

Actually the exception also occurs when you remove the windowClosing from the
source.

The problem was that a sample eventinvocation was prepared to see if things have
changed, but that sample was provided with a live ListenerType. When things have
changed, it disposes the live one and tries to use the sample eventinvocation.
Unfortunately disposing the live one messes up the sample eventinvocation and
NPEs result. Released class
